short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Orthodox Welcome replaces your new tab with an inspiring Orthodox-themed page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your New Tab with Orthodox Christian Inspiration! ☦️

Bring calm and reflection into your daily browsing with this Orthodox Christian-themed extension. Each time you open a new tab, immerse yourself in a beautifully chosen background, a current time display, and a thoughtfully selected Bible verse to uplift and inspire.

Why install this extension? This extension offers a gentle reminder of faith and purpose amidst the digital bustle. Whether you seek a moment of reflection, spiritual encouragement, or simply a visually soothing experience, this extension provides a refreshing way to keep faith at the forefront. Ideal for anyone looking to incorporate Orthodox Christian values into their daily routine.

Experience serenity and inspiration with every new tab. Add this extension today!
